name: PubSub to GCS Streaming beam python flex template
description: PubSub to GCS Streaming beam python flex template.

parameters.name: input_subscription
parameters.label: Input PubSub subscription.
parameters.helpText: Name of the input PubSub subscription to consume from.

parameters.name: output_path
parameters.label: Gcs directory to store files
parameters.helpText: Path of the output GCS file directory including the prefix.

parameters.name: Window_size
parameters.label: Window interval in minutes (default 10 mins)
parameters.helpText: Window interval in minutes for grouping incoming messages.

parameters.name: num_shards
parameters.label: Number of shards (default 1 shard)
parameters.helpText: Number of files to be written per window
